metadata.name: SkullGrapes
metadata.description:
I've created this animation right before putin  invaded my country Ukraine. I woke up under a missile explosion in my city. This was one of the scariest moments in my life. I hope this is not my last artwork. Fuck putin, Fuck ruSSia, Fuck War.  Слава Україні! 

[Donate Ukraine](https://linktr.ee/RazomForUkraine)
